list-item.p: Patients aged 18 years or older who are admitted to the hospital because of leukaemia, lymphoma or to undergo haematopoietic stem-cell transplantation (HSCT)
Carriers of multiple-lumen, non-tunnelled CVCs, including peripherally inserted central catheters (PICCs)
Patients who are expected to develop neutropenia (< 500 neutrophils/μL) lasting more than 7 days
